messages.subject: Affordable Shinsengumi films
messages.msgSnippet: You guys might want to check out the link I ll post at the end. This person has a bunch of samurai movies for sale including many talked about on this
messages.messageBody:
You guys might want to check out the link I'll post at the end. This
person has a bunch of samurai movies for sale including many talked
about on this list--Cruel Story--Shinsengumi Chronicles,
Mibugishiden/When the Last Sword is Drawn, Band of Assassins etc.
The prices are generally under $15 (most in the $12.99--13.99 range). I
bought from this person on eBay and was pleased with the deal.

http://www.andale.com/stores/sf_home.jsp?mode=1&sfUrl=realkungfuflix

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
